title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Litecoin (LTC) Falls 4.7% as Index Inches Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Hedera (HBAR) was also among the underperformers, dipping 3.9%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3136.62, down 0.6% (-20.46) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

Six of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: APT (+1.8%) and DOT (+1.7%).

Laggards: LTC (-4.7%) and HBAR (-3.9%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 0.6% with more assets trading lower than higher, and significant losses in LTC (-4.7%) and HBAR (-3.9%) indicating overall market weakness.
